verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> time, while <S%H1931>he<s%> was <S%H5750>yet<s%> shut <S%H6113>up<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>prison,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H6213>maker<s%> thereof, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H3335>formed<s%> it, to <S%H3559>establish<s%> it; the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is his <S%H8034>name;<s%>

Call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, and I will <S%H6030>answer<s%> thee, and <S%H5046>show<s%> thee <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H1219>mighty<s%> things, which thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> which are thrown <S%H5422>down<s%> <S%H413>by<s%> the <S%H5550>mounts,<s%> and <S%H413>by<s%> the <S%H2719>sword;<s%>

They <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> but it is to <S%H4390>fill<s%> them <S%H854>with<s%> the dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I have <S%H5221>slain<s%> in mine <S%H639>anger<s%> and in my <S%H2534>fury,<s%> and <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> I have <S%H5641>hid<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> from <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H4480>city.<s%> <S%H5892><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will <S%H4608>bring<s%> it <S%H724>health<s%> and <S%H4832>cure,<s%> and I will <S%H7495>cure<s%> them, and will <S%H1540>reveal<s%> unto them the <S%H6283>abundance<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> and <S%H571>truth.<s%>

And I will <S%H853>cause<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H7725>return,<s%> and will <S%H1129>build<s%> them, as at the <S%H7223>first.<s%>

And I will <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> them from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> <S%H834>whereby<s%> they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against me; and I will <S%H5545>pardon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquities,<s%> <S%H834>whereby<s%> they have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and <S%H834>whereby<s%> they have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against me.

And it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> to me a <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H8342>joy,<s%> a <S%H8416>praise<s%> and an <S%H8597>honor<s%> before <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> do <S%H6213>unto<s%> them: and they shall <S%H6342>fear<s%> and <S%H7264>tremble<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2896>goodness<s%> and <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7965>prosperity<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6213>procure<s%> unto it.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H5750>Again<s%> there shall be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> shall be <S%H2720>desolate<s%> <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H369><s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H369><s%> <S%H929>beast,<s%> even in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> that are <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H369><s%> <S%H120>man,<s%> and <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H369><s%> <S%H3427>inhabitant,<s%> and <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H369><s%> <S%H929>beast,<s%>

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8342>joy,<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H2860>bridegroom,<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3618>bride,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of them that shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3034>Praise<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H2896>good;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endureth <S%H5769>forever:<s%> and of them that shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the sacrifice of <S%H8426>praise<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> <S%H3588>For<s%> I will cause to <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> as at the <S%H7223>first,<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> <S%H5750>Again<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> which is <S%H2720>desolate<s%> <S%H4480>without<s%> <S%H369><s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H5704>without<s%> <S%H929>beast,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof, shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> causing their <S%H6629>flocks<s%> to lie <S%H7257>down.<s%>

In the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H8219>vale,<s%> and in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H5045>south,<s%> and in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> and in the places <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> shall the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> <S%H5921>under<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of him that <S%H4487>telleth<s%> them, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that I will <S%H6965>perform<s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H1696>promised<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

In <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> will I cause the <S%H6780>Branch<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to grow <S%H6779>up<s%> unto <S%H1732>David;<s%> and he shall <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

In <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H3063>Judah<s%> be <S%H3467>saved,<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely:<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> is the name <S%H834>wherewith<s%> she shall be <S%H7121>called,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H3772>want<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H3772>want<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> me to <S%H5927>offer<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> and to <S%H6999>kindle<s%> meat <S%H4503>offerings,<s%> and to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> <S%H3605>continually.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> ye can <S%H6565>break<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3117>day,<s%> and my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and that there should <S%H1115>not<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> in their <S%H6256>season;<s%>

Then may <S%H1571>also<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> be <S%H6565>broken<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> that he should not <S%H4480>have<s%> <S%H1961><s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H3678>throne;<s%> and <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> my <S%H8334>ministers.<s%>

As <S%H834><s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H5608>numbered,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H4058>measured:<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will I <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> that minister <S%H8334>unto<s%> me.
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Considerest <S%H7200><s%> thou <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4940>families<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H977>chosen,<s%> he hath even cast them <S%H3988>off?<s%> thus they have <S%H5006>despised<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> that they should be <S%H4480>no<s%> <S%H1961><s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> be <S%H3808>not<s%> with <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night,<s%> and if I have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7760>appointed<s%> the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth;<s%>

Then <S%H1571><s%> will I cast <S%H3988>away<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> so that I will not <S%H4480>take<s%> <S%H3947><s%> any of his <S%H4480>seed<s%> <S%H2233><s%> to be <S%H4910>rulers<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H3446>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H853>cause<s%> their <S%H7622>captivity<s%> to <S%H7725>return,<s%> and have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on them.
